attributes.action: Stop National Insurance contributions for healthcare workers.
attributes.additional_details:
Lives were lost yet they battled on with inadequate protection working tirelessly 24/7 while the Government and science caught up. Thousands clapped, cheered and donated to the funds, raising cash in support of the NHS.
If everyone who felt compelled to donate and clap would now raise their voice against this Government who insult healthcare workers with a 1% pay rise, we can send an overwhelming message that such abuse of their position will not be accepted any longer.
attributes.background:
Stop healthcare workers paying their own salaries.
Cut NI contributions for healthcare workers, the heroes who came forward when the call came to care for the nation. They nursed politicians back to health, they disregarded their own needs & health to look after everyone else's loved ones

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Stop deducting Tax and NI from our NHS workers.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572153
